briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of FIRTECH in Patients With Mild to Moderate Acute Low Back Pain
officialTitle: A Phase IIIB Randomized, Open Label, Two Arms and Parallel Group Clinical Trial to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of FIRTECH (Infrared Therapy Patch), for Treating Patients Suffering From Mild to Moderate Acute Low Back Pain
summary:
Primary Objective:

To assess the efficacy of the infrared therapy patch (ITP) FIRTECH for treating participants suffering from mild to moderate acute low back pain.

Secondary Objectives:

* To assess the efficacy of ITP FIRTECH on participant disability
* To assess the efficacy of ITP FIRTECH on the degree of participant mobility
* To assess the safety of ITP FIRTECH

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Numerical Rating Scale (NRS) Responders at Day 5
